title: Chapter 1852 - All Under Control
body:
Chapter 1852 - All Under Control

Before his voice had even finished echoing through the air, Su Yi charged.

He took a step forward, and his aura rumbled and boomed. His Immortal Origin Space seemed to ignite within him, resonating with his blood and even his soul.

The dazzlingly bright light of the Grand Dao rose from his entire body as his imposing majesty soared to unprecedented heights.

But when Qing Wu saw this, her beautiful eyes flashed with derision. They say a cornered dog will try to jump over a wall. Seems it's true. Very well, let him try. If he wants to try me, I don’t mind slapping him down.

Boom!

Her Great Profound Stage cultivation base boiled over as she circulated it to its maximum power. Her Crescent Moon Blade flowed with imposing Dao Light as she readied herself for battle.

She understood the limits of Su Yi’s strength, but she wouldn’t get complacent. After all, a lion used its full strength even when hunting a rabbit.

If Su Yi dared draw near, she’d strike with unstoppable force and end this battle once and for all.

“Activate!” Su Yi raised his right hand into the air. The Sword of the Human Realm let out a clear, impassioned hum, shaking the...
